name: Multimirror (itch)
description:
Multimirror is now on Greenlight! All itch.io puchasers will receive a Steam key once the game is greenlit and released on Steam.

Multimirror is a minimal grid-based puzzle game.

With the exception of black circles and the winning point, all circles in the grid can be reflected around another circle in the same row or column given that it will stay inside the grid and won't overlap another circle.

The objective is to take the red circle to the winning point.
Blue circles do not have any special conditions, and green circles can only be used to reflect a circle once.

Features:

  • 50 handcrafted levels
  • Random level generator with adjustable size and difficulty (more parameters planned)
  • Level-editor
    Create and share your own levels or random levels you generate. You can name custom levels too.
